name: Rose Pheromone
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] se balancea y gira de su cuerpo mientras pasa las manos sobre su piel suave, poniendo un espectáculo seductor como un maravilloso e infatuante aroma de rosa se extiende por el aire, y la cabeza de [TargetName] se niega rosa mientras inunda [TargetHisOrHer]¡Sentidos en una ola empalagosa!
statusMiss: |f|GivePerkToMonster|/|Spreading Status|n|[AttackerName] sways and gyrates her body while running her hands over her soft skin, putting on a seductive show as a wonderful, infatuating rose scent slowly spreads through the air, but [TargetName] manages to shake off its infatuating effects. Although, the sweet fragrance is increasingly permeating the air...
